snippet: The bomber was dispatched on Sunday to conduct training missions after North Korea’s fourth underground nuclear test.
abstract: American military flies long-range B-52 bomber from Guam to Osan Air Base in Seoul, South Korea, in show of force days after North Korea tests what leader Kim Jong-un claims was hydrogen bomb; Adm Harry B Harris Jr of Pacific Command says flight of nuclear-ready aircraft demonstrates America’s commitment to allies.
lead_paragraph: The bomber was dispatched on Sunday to conduct training missions after North Korea’s fourth underground nuclear test.

headline.main: In Show of Alliance, American Forces Fly B-52 Bomber Over South Korea
headline.print_headline: In Show of Alliance, U.S. Forces Fly B-52 Bomber Over South Korea

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
